title: Deux Tetes
provenance_text:
Karel Appel [1921-2006], Paris, France; Gimpel Fils, Ltd, London, England, in November 1959; purchased by Mr. [1920-1988] and Mrs. Edward Haskell, Pittsburgh, PA, November 5, 1959 until June 23, 1988 [1]; Jane (Mrs. Edward) Haskell [1923-2013], June 23, 1988 until May 28, 2013; partial gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, December 2002, December 2005, and remainder bequest in September 2013. 

Notes:
[1]. See Gimpel Fils invoice for $600 in curatorial file.
